name: Bleed (itch) (bustingjam)
description:
//---------------development build-----------------------------//

An Arcade Twin stick shooter with RPG elements to it !

Controls!

W,A,S,D movement

Left mouse to shoot , rightmouse to shoot different bullettype when you get it in game

Space bar to hide your inventory 

Q,E are power ups but can only be used when looted in the game

R to restart any time in the game but not when you die

//---------------------------------UI of in-game--------------//

it is drag and drop system 

when collect any thing say a orb or drink you get them in inventory , you can use them when ever you want 

Fusion cell can be use with power cards to obtain orb cards which will boost your exp in the game!

UI will not pause in game when you are using it , better be cautious when  to use it in game!

//-------------------------Reward of the game-----------------------//

player with highest level and good loot items will be powerful in the game  

 

Music used 

Credits:

Hyper-Spoiler
